role: MSIB IBM Skillsbuild for AI & Cybersecurity
description: Completed the MSIB IBM Skillsbuild program focused on AI and Cybersecurity. Developed a strong understanding of Artificial Intelligence concepts, machine learning models, and cybersecurity practices. This experience included hands-on projects that enhanced my technical skills, enabling me to apply AI-driven solutions while maintaining a secure development environment.

Participated in the MSIB Full-stack Web Developer program, where I gained hands-on experience in building web applications using modern technologies. This role involved working on both front-end and back-end development, enhancing my skills in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and server-side frameworks, while collaborating on real-world projects to deliver functional and scalable web solutions.

Currently pursuing a degree in Informatics Engineering, focusing on software development, web technologies, and emerging areas like Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. This experience has honed my skills in problem-solving, programming, and implementing tech solutions to real-world challenges.
